title: Erased Account ?
body: My account is now randomly not working for some reason, I came back from school and whe nI tried to log in on my account (blackvinc03) it was saying my user name or password was incorrect, it wasn't caps or any of that... Did I get banned ? Hacked ? Please help me !!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=RogueTKM,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=stdumiRA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-26T05:57:04.228+0000)
>
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694
> 
> Try this, and god speed

Hey, hum i've tried but I can't recieve the email to change my password or username...  weird .. help meee ! :(
Sounds like someone hacked it and changed password..id send in a ticket. also check your profile on champ.gg to see if theres any matches being played that arent you

> [{quoted}](name=RogueTKM,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=stdumiRA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-25T20:07:42.304+0000)
>
> Sounds like someone hacked it and changed password..id send in a ticket. also check your profile on champ.gg to see if theres any matches being played that arent you

Hey I looked and nobody has played any games lately.
Well, isn't champion.gg for counters and all ? I can't find my account in there.
And how can I send a ticket ?
You got phish rekt. Reset your password.
